MultiSource
protected class MultiSource.Index
extends java.lang.Object

The relative position of the data record at the position given (absolut position) Index: Absolut position of the data record to analize Return the relative position of the data record at the position given (absolut position). It is the position of the data record in the data source that the data record belongs to
